GSD.description:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: initialize delayed works at l2cap_chan_create()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 776f33c12fdb269a9dae0e54289904f115298a75. For more details please see the references link.
